casebody.data:
No. 11-393. National Federation of Independent Business, et al., Petitioners v. Kathleen Sebelius, Secretary of Health and Human Services, et al. Florida, et al., Petitioners v. Department of Health and Human Services, et al. No. 11-400. 565 U.S. 1176, 132 S. Ct. 1161,

181 L. Ed. 2d 1015,

2012 U.S. LEXIS 981. January 23, 2012.

Motion of Freedom Watch for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument denied.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion.
